messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] intro---school baggage
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/17/2002 2:17:34 PM Eastern Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes: ... Well, at the Live & Learn Unschooling Conference
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/17/2002 2:17:34 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
ALicia wrote:
> . While I know in my bones that this is the best approach for
> my children, I still struggle with a certain amount of ingrained
> schoolishness. Hanging with other unschoolers is a great counterbalance
> for that.
>
>

Well, at the Live & Learn Unschooling Conference in Columbia, SOUTH Carolina
11-13 October, Joyce Fetteroll (the moderator) will be giving a presentation
on getting rid of that schoolish baggage---how to let go. Maybe you could
take a family vacation to sunny SC!
<G>
Kelly

Kelly Lovejoy, Coordinator
Schools Out Support
mailto:coordinator@...
803-776-4849
